channel.title: Spammer Blocker
channel.description:
How Do you Add Spammer Blocker To A 508 Server? Or Like Change Talking System Person That Talks SameThing Over 5 Times Gets System IpBanned? Only Asking This Cause ::ipban Doesn't Work For My Server.
Is Player Right 2 - Owner? Cause I think Only Owner Can Ipban And I am The Owner? I set MYself To Owner Please Help me!!

item.title: Spammer Blocker
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

Everytime I do ::ipban it’s Making me log off But i am relog back in

Read full topic

item.title: Spammer Blocker
item.dc:creator: @qatar qatar
item.description:
@qatar wrote:

i guess this code would help you
if (command.startsWith(“ipban”) && playerRights > PLAYER RIGHT NEEDED) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(6);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

		p.writeLog(p.playerLastConnect, "ipbans");
		p.disconnected = true;
		sM("You have ipbanned "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to ip ban..");
            }
        }

Read full topic

item.title: Spammer Blocker
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

everyone is using proxy ips lol .
thats why u cant ipban him .
and what i suggest is just adding a speaking timer with intervals of 5 seconds and if he keeps spamming just mute the actual account he will get bored eventually of making accounts.

Read full topic
